00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "ElementQM.hpp"
00035 #include "PatchData.hpp"
00036 
00037 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00038 
00039 ElementQM::~ElementQM() {}
00040 
00041 void ElementQM::get_evaluations( PatchData& pd, 
00042                         std::vector<size_t>& handles,
00043                         bool free_vertices_only, 
00044                         MsqError& err )
00045 {
00046   get_element_evaluations( pd, handles, free_vertices_only, err );
00047 }
00048 
00049 void ElementQM::get_element_evaluations( PatchData& pd, 
00050                         std::vector<size_t>& handles,
00051                         bool free_vertices_only, 
00052                         MsqError& err )
00053 {
00054   size_t num_elem = pd.num_elements();
00055   if (!free_vertices_only) {
00056     handles.resize( num_elem );
00057     for (size_t i = 0; i < num_elem; ++i)
00058       handles[i] = i;
00059     return;
00060   }
00061   
00062   handles.clear();
00063   for (size_t i = 0; i < num_elem; ++i) {
00064       // check if element has any free vertices
00065     MsqMeshEntity& elem = pd.element_by_index(i);
00066     unsigned num_vtx = elem.node_count();
00067     size_t* vtx = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
00068     unsigned j;
00069     for (j = 0; j < num_vtx && vtx[j] >= pd.num_free_vertices(); ++j);
00070     if (j < num_vtx)
00071       handles.push_back(i);
00072   }
00073 }
00074 
00075 bool ElementQM::evaluate_with_indices( PatchData& pd,
00076                                        size_t handle,
00077                                        double& value,
00078                                        std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00079                                        MsqError& err )
00080 {
00081   const MsqMeshEntity& elem = pd.element_by_index(handle);
00082   const size_t* vtx = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
00083   const unsigned n = elem.vertex_count();
00084   indices.clear();
00085   for (unsigned i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00086     if (vtx[i] < pd.num_free_vertices())
00087       indices.push_back( vtx[i] );
00088   
00089   bool rval = evaluate( pd, handle, value, err );
00090   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && rval;
00091 }
